title: 107_hr2310
content:
The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for uniformed services members effective January 1, 2002, based on pay grade and years of service. The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for commissioned officers based on pay grade and years of service. The "Military Pay Raise Act of 2001" increases monthly basic pay for commissioned officers based on pay grade and years of service. The pay percentages for different officer ranks are as follows:
O-6: 7.3%
O-5: 7.3%
O-4: 9.0%
O-3: 8.3%
O-2: 7.3%
O-1: 7.3%
O-10: 7.3%
O-9: 7.3%
O-8: 7.3%
O-7: 7.3% The monthly basic pay percentages for commissioned officers in different ranks range from 7.3% to 9.0%. The monthly basic pay percentages for commissioned officers in different ranks range from 7.3% to 9.0%. The percentages are consistent across various age brackets. The basic pay percentages for commissioned officers in different ranks range from 7.3% to 9.0% and are consistent across various age brackets. Commissioned officers with over 4 years of active duty service as an enlisted member or warrant officer have pay grade percentages ranging from 7.3% to 8.3%, which increase with years of service up to over 16 years. Commissioned officers with over 4 years of active duty service have pay grade percentages ranging from 7.3% to 8.3%, increasing with years of service up to over 26 years. Warrant officers' pay grade percentages range from 7.5% to 8.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 16 years. Warrant officers' pay grade percentages range from 7.5% to 8.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 26 years. Warrant officers' pay grade percentages range from 7.5% to 8.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 26 years. Enlisted members' pay grade percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 6 years. Enlisted members' pay grade percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 6 years. The percentages for different pay grades are as follows: E-1 to E-5 at 8.5%, E-6 at 8.5%, E-7 at 9.5%, E-8 at 10.0%, and E-9 at 10.5%. Enlisted members' pay grade percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 6 years. The percentages for different pay grades are as follows: E-1 to E-5 at 8.5%, E-6 at 8.5%, E-7 at 9.5%, E-8 at 10.0%, and E-9 at 10.5%. Enlisted members' pay grade percentages range from 7.3% to 10.5% based on years of service, increasing up to over 6 years. Waiver of adjustment to monthly basic pay rates for uniformed services members in fiscal year 2002 as per section 1009 of title 37, United States Code.
